name: Hyper Heights Champs
description:
Hyper Heights Champs is an exciting approach to futuristic cyberpunk sports, where contestants have to reach dangerous heights while avoiding the menace of the security droids that guard the exit.

But wait! Here comes a new challenger! Packed with high-end tech, the game offers state-of-the-art multiplayer gameplay: a second player can battle against you at any time, and each player has its own screen! Hinder you opponent's progress by shooting and stunning it, and take the lead before it recovers!

Wait no more! Grab your friends and start racing to conquer the title of Hyper Heights Champ!
